policies.description: Users are responsible for verifying all booking details before finalizing a purchase.

details.user_responsibility: Check date, time, number of tickets, and seating (if applicable) before payment.
details.confirmation_status: A booking is confirmed only upon receipt of a digital ticket/confirmation ID.

policies.agent_response_template: Please **always double-check** the event date, time, and ticket quantity before submitting payment to avoid errors.

policies.description: Defines the user's obligations regarding their account credentials and actions.

details.password_protocol: Use a strong, unique password and do not share credentials.
details.unauthorized_use: The account holder is liable for all activity conducted through their account.
details.reporting_stolen: Report any suspicion of unauthorized access to Customer Service immediately.

policies.agent_response_template: You are fully responsible for maintaining your account security. Report unauthorized activity immediately.

policies.description: Lists behaviors that are forbidden on the platform.

prohibitions: Attempting to reverse-engineer or exploit the application's code.
Bulk resale of tickets for profit beyond original purchase price.
Using abusive language in chat or support channels.
details.consequence: Violation may lead to account suspension and permanent ban.

policies.agent_response_template: Automated ticket purchasing or any exploitation of the app is strictly prohibited and will result in account suspension.

policies.description: Instructions for how tickets must be used at the event location.

details.format_requirement: Digital tickets must be presented on a mobile device (screenshot may not be accepted).
details.redemption_window: Tickets are only valid for the specified date and time and cannot be used for a different event.

policies.agent_response_template: Please ensure your digital ticket is ready on your mobile device for scanning. It is only valid for the date and time listed on the confirmation.
